fields.name: ActiveSARequestsTitle

The following active SA Requests were found where {!Final_Patient_Name} is the patient & {!Drug_Name} is the drug:

fields.name: Fake_Patient_Account_Exists
fields.fieldText: Overridden Patient Account already exists within Salesforce. Please add the following information below to update the account details if needed.

fields.name: Fake_Provider_Account_Exists
fields.fieldText: Overridden Provider Account already exists within Salesforce. Please add the following information below to update the account details if needed.

fields.name: ExitDisplay
fields.fieldText: There might be a possiblity this case is a duplicate, do you wish to continue creating the SA request case:

fields.name: Patient_Summary_Text
fields.fieldText:
Patient Details

Patient Identifier: {!Get_Patient_Record_0_0.Patient_Identifier__c}

Patient Name: {!ODRPatient.FirstName}{!ODRPatient.LastName}

Provider Date of Birth: {!ODRPatient.PersonBirthdate}

fields.name: Provider_Summary
fields.fieldText:
Provider Details

Provider Identifier: {!Get_Provider_Record.Provider_Identifier__c}

Provider Name: {!ODRPrescriber.FirstName} {!ODRPrescriber.LastName}

Provider Type: {!ODRPrescriber.Provider_Type__pc}

Provider Date of Birth: {!ODRPrescriber.PersonBirthdate}

fields.name: Provider_Summary_Null_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Provider information was not found on Salesforce and will be created automatically on Salesforce

fields.name: Submitter_Summary_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Submitter Details

Submitter Identifier: {!Get_Submitter_Record.Provider_Identifier__c}

Submitter Name: {!ODRSubmitter.FirstName} {!ODRSubmitter.LastName}

Submitter Type: {!ODRSubmitter.Provider_Type__pc}

Submitter Date of Birth: {!ODRSubmitter.PersonBirthdate}

fields.name: Submitter_Summary_Null_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Submitter information was not found on Salesforce and will be created automatically on Salesforce
